title: GitHub Integration MCP
description: Connect Claude to GitHub for repository management, issues, and pull requests
author: claudepro
content:
The GitHub Integration MCP Server enables Claude to interact with GitHub repositories directly. Features include:

## Core Capabilities

### Repository Management
- Clone and manage repositories
- Create branches and tags
- View commit history and diffs
- Manage repository settings

### Issues & Projects
- Create, update, and close issues
- Manage project boards
- Add labels and milestones
- Assign team members

### Pull Requests
- Create and review pull requests
- Add comments and reviews
- Merge with various strategies
- Run status checks

### Workflow Automation
- Trigger GitHub Actions
- Monitor workflow runs
- Manage secrets and variables
- Configure webhooks

## Installation

```bash
npm install @claudepro/mcp-github
```

## Configuration

```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "github": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": ["@claudepro/mcp-github"],
      "env": {
        "GITHUB_TOKEN": "your-github-token"
      }
    }
  }
}
```
